channel.title: Help please
channel.description: Hey gies, i just got done editing my server, and now i want peopl to start connecting to it. It's currently set on 127.0.0.1, and ive already downloaded and made my host on no-ip duc. I just need to set my client and server up to connect to each other, and i forgot how. Can anyone tell me? thanks

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @power_of_the_blood power of the blood
item.description:
@power_of_the_blood wrote:

It’s still not wroking. What files in the server and client do i need to change so that other people can connect to my server. Somthing to do do wth server.config or client.config. That’s what i ment. Anyone help me please?

anyone…please?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

i wasnt tell you to use hamachi i was replying to this and did you add an exception to port 43594 tcp along with the server ip?

power of the blood:

It keeps saying error connecting to server. do i need hamachi?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Cancel Cancel
item.description:
@Cancel wrote:

:o its the only way it’ll work, and i DO NOT even think about using hamachi. lol i have no idea why, but my firewall doesnt like port 43594 for some reason.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

Cancel:

Turn off your firewall xD happened to me too and i went nuts for several days and figured out it was my firewall.

cancel that is the biggest mistake ever you should scan your computer now

and hamachi can give you an virus

Read full topic
